contentList.content: A special potion that grants utility spells as toggleable passives.
The tumultuous elemental forces never threaten you. You are invulnerable.
You learn a number of spells that grant you control on all elements. Fire, Water, Lightning, Light and Darkness at the tip of your fingers.
You learn many spells that will aid you in your journey. Flying, being invisible, and so much more at the tip of your fingers.
